# SaaS Starter Kit

> A production-ready SaaS starter kit built with Next.js 15, React 19, Convex, and Clerk.

## About

This is a SaaS application with authentication, payments, team management, and email automation built in.

## Key Pages

- / - Homepage with product overview and pricing
- /blog - Blog articles and updates
- /sign-up - Create a free account
- /sign-in - Sign in to your account

## Technical

- Built with Next.js 15 and React 19
- Real-time backend with Convex
- Authentication with Clerk
- Payments with Lemon Squeezy
- Styling with Tailwind CSS 4
